panels.description: It indicates whether the current PD is the leader or a follower.

panels.description: The number of different operators that are newly created

panels.description: The number of different operators that have been checked. It mainly checks if the current step is finished; if yes, it returns the next step to be executed.
panels.title: Schedule operator check

panels.description: The number of different operators that are finished
panels.title: Schedule operator finish

panels.description: The number of different operators that are replaced or canceled
panels.title: Schedule operator replaced or canceled

panels.description: The number of operators in different status
panels.title: Schedule operators count by state

panels.description: The time consumed when the operator is finished in .99
panels.title: Operator finish duration

panels.description: The time consumed when the operator step is finished in .99
panels.title: Operator step finish duration

panels.description: The number of different operators that are failed to be created due to limit configuration
panels.title: Operator limit

panels.description: The capacity size of each TiKV instance
panels.title: Store capacity

panels.description: The available capacity size of each TiKV instance
panels.title: Store available

panels.description: The used capacity size of each TiKV instance
panels.title: Store used

panels.description: It is equal to Store available capacity size over Store capacity size for each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance",  type="store_available"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance="$instance",  type="store_capacity"}) by (address, store)

panels.title: Store available ratio

panels.description: The size amplification, which is equal to Store Region size over Store used capacity size, of each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance",  type="region_size"}) by (address, store) / sum(pd_scheduler_store_status{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance="$instance",  type="store_used"}) by (address, store) * 2^20

panels.title: Size amplification

panels.title: 99% Region heartbeat handle latency

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats which each TiKV instance reports to PD

targets.expr: sum(delta(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance", type="report", status="ok"}[1m])) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report

panels.description: The count of the corresponding schedule commands which PD sends to each TiKV instance
panels.title: Region schedule push

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats with the error status

targets.expr: sum(delta(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance", type="report", status="err"}[1m])) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report error

panels.description: The count of the heartbeats with the ok status

targets.expr: sum(delta(pd_scheduler_region_heartbeat{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance", type="report", status="bind"}[1m])) by (address, store)

panels.title: Region heartbeat report active

panels.description: The store heartbeat handle duration in .99
panels.title: 99% store heartbeat handle duration

panels.description: The count of the message which PD send to each TiKV instance

targets.expr: sum(delta(pd_hbstream_region_message{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance", type="push", status="ok"}[1m])) by (address, store)

panels.title: Heartbeat stream report

panels.description: The count of the message which PD send to each TiKV instance with error status

targets.expr: sum(delta(pd_hbstream_region_message{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", store=~"$store", instance="$instance", type="push", status="err"}[1m])) by (address, store)

panels.title: Heartbeat stream report error
